product_summary: HeyForm is an open-source form builder that allows anyone to create engaging conversational forms for surveys, questionnaires, quizzes, and polls. No coding skills required. With HeyForm, you can easily build forms that are visually appealing, mobile-responsive, and packed with powerful features like conditional logic, file uploads, and integrations with popular marketing tools. HeyForm is free to use for up to 10 forms and 100 responses per month. Paid plans start at $25 per month for unlimited forms and responses.
product_pros: Easy to use, no coding required
Powerful features like conditional logic and file uploads
product_cons: Limited features on the free plan
Some advanced features require a paid plan
Can be slow to load at times
Not as many templates as some other form builders

product_usecases.details: HeyForm can be used to collect customer feedback through surveys, questionnaires, and polls. This feedback can be used to improve products and services, identify areas for improvement, and make better decisions.
HeyForm can be used to generate leads by creating forms that capture contact information. These forms can be embedded on websites, landing pages, and social media pages.

HeyForm can be used to conduct market research by creating surveys and polls that gather data about target markets. This data can be used to identify trends, understand customer needs, and develop new products and services.

HeyForm can be used to create online quizzes and assessments for educational purposes or for fun. These quizzes and assessments can be shared with others and can be used to track progress and identify areas for improvement.
HeyForm can be used to collect event registrations by creating forms that capture attendee information. These forms can be embedded on websites, landing pages, and social media pages.

product_toolfor.details: HeyForm is a great tool for small businesses that need to collect customer feedback, generate leads, and conduct market research.
HeyForm is a great tool for marketing agencies that need to create forms for their clients.
HeyForm is a great tool for educational institutions that need to create online quizzes and assessments.
HeyForm is a great tool for nonprofit organizations that need to collect donations and register volunteers.
HeyForm is a great tool for individuals who need to create forms for personal use, such as party invitations, RSVPs, and contact forms.

product_pricing: HeyForm is free to use for up to 10 forms and 100 responses per month. Paid plans start at $25 per month for unlimited forms and responses.
